Ukraine must find innovative ways to fight, new commander saysUkraine's armed forces must adapt and find innovative ways to fight to achieve victory over Russian invaders, Kyiv's new armed forces chief said on Friday, in his first public remarks since taking command. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 13:20:07 GMT 6UUQEWXIVJMFVNIEPV5W3QYQJA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-must-find-innovative-ways-to-fight-new-commander-says-2024-02-09/Max Hunder世界欧洲
Ukraine to overhaul business regulations to prop up war-ravaged economyUkraine's government is working to overhaul its business regulation system to scrap and update hundreds of documents to help entrepreneurship and boost the war-ravaged economy, a deputy economy minister said. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 13:09:15 GMT I6PN2BZXTZOW7AW6AEUO5C5SHA https://www.reuters.com/world/ukraine-overhauls-business-regulations-prop-up-war-ravagged-economy-2024-02-09/Olena Harmash世界
Almost 10% of Gaza's under-fives now acutely malnourished, UN saysAlmost one in 10 of Gazan children under five are now acutely malnourished, overwhelmingly as a result of Israel's war on the territory's Hamas rulers, according to initial U.N. data from arm measurements that show physical wasting. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 13:04:11 GMT OFXBDA3V4JPNVGSGL2PTKPRZKI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/almost-10-gazas-under- Fives-now-acutely-malnourished-un-says-2024-02-09/Emma Farge世界中东地区
Sinn Fein leader attends police graduation in first for Northern IrelandNorthern Ireland First Minister Michelle O'Neill attended a police graduation ceremony on Friday in a first for her Sinn Fein party, which has in the past been cool in its support for the force established following the region's 1998 peace deal. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 12:53:15 GMT JUSTW4JCRI4LLGS244LRYIHGU https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/sinn-fein-leader-attends-police-graduation-first-northern-ireland-2024-02-09/Reuters世界英国
Vadim Krasikov, the Russian hitman Putin wants to swap for U.S. journalistThe man Russian President Vladimir Putin wants in exchange for releasing American journalist Evan Gershkovich is Vadim Krasikov, serving a life sentence for murdering an exiled Chechen-Georgian dissident in a Berlin park in broad daylight. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 12:50:35 GMT GUKNTYXIKRK2RM6OFPRKUXMFBE https://www.reuters.com/world/vadim-krasikov- Russian-hitman-putin-wants-swap-us-journalist-2024-02-09/Reuters世界
Syrian air defences respond to 'hostile targets' in vicinity of Damascus- state mediaSyrian air defences shot down on Friday two drones in the west of Damascus, state media reported, citing a military source as saying the drones came from the direction of the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights to the west of the capital. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 12:41:01 GMT 4W6CFWGDTNOM5KHB3W7RQDIECY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/syrian-air-defenses-respond-to-hostile-targets-vicinity-damascus-state-media-2024-02-09/Reuters世界中东地区
Prince Harry accepts substantial damages to settle Mirror Group casePrince Harry has settled the remainder of his lawsuit against Mirror Group Newspapers over phone-hacking and other unlawful acts after the publisher agreed to pay substantial damages and his legal costs, his lawyer told London's High Court on Friday. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 12:38:39 GMT LPDWDPDDDWZORZBRK5T5C4YB4GA https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/prince-harry-accepts-substantial-damages-settle-mirror-group-case-2024-02-09/Reuters世界英国
Colombia announces start of peace process with Segunda Marquetalia rebel factionColombia's government and a dissident faction of the former FARC rebel group known as the Second Marquetalia said on Friday they have started a peace process. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 12:34:23 GMT IQFA7MOBYNKOVMSQ6GTXOJIAIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombia-announces-start-peace-process-with-second-marquetalia-rebel-faction-2024-02-09/Reuters世界美洲
Greece to raise investment price for 'golden visas', PM saysGreece is planning to further raise the investment threshold for "golden visas" to foreigners to 800,000 euros ($861,520) for real estate in cities and islands where demand is high, Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said on Friday. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 12:32:00 GMT W3GTAPFTQJIKBC2CBR4JZJWHF4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/greece-raise-investment-price-golden-visas-pm-says-2024-02-09/Reuters世界欧洲
Arab foreign ministers discuss Gaza in Riyadh following Blinken visit to the regionSeveral Arab foreign ministers discussed the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza at talks in Riyadh, Saudi state media reported on Friday, following a Middle East tour by U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken that stirred hopes for a long-awaited Gaza truce deal. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 12:31:33 GMT CYW5CVHYJNCFHXN4MBTUW4XOM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/arab-foreign-ministers-discuss-gaza-riyadh-following-blinking-visit-region-2024-02-09/Reuters世界中东地区
Russians enter North Korea in first foreign tour group since COVID-19 pandemicAbout 100 Russians flew to North Korea on Friday for a private tour, becoming the first foreign group to visit the reclusive state following the COVID-19 pandemic in a landmark trip summed up by the Russian embassy as "Pyongyang opens its door." Fri, 09 Feb 2024 12:22:49 GMT P5WG6J75FNLX3PEOWS7页https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russians-enter-north-korea-first-foreign-tour-group-since-covid-19-pandemic-2024-02-09/Jack Kim世界
